message:
Hi Bob,

I’m excited to present an opportunity for you to acquire this product at a price of $11,000. I believe this will provide great value for you, considering it’s worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Jose.  While I appreciate the value you're offering, I'm looking to get this product for a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $10500.  Let me know what you think.
